text: The surge in child cases and hospitalizations in Florida directly contradicts US Secretary of Education Betsy DeVos’ claims that children are “stoppers of the disease” who “don’t get it and transmit it themselves.” https://t.co/ILpTmF3CLr

urls.title: Child hospitalizations from Covid-19 surge 23% in Florida as schools statewide must reopen
urls.description: Just weeks before schools must open across Florida, the numbers of new cases and hospitalizations due to Covid-19 have surged.
